from collections import Counter

n = int(input())
s = input()

counter = 0

for i in Counter(s).values():
    counter += i // 2

print(counter)

from collections import Counter

input()
s = input()

counter = 0

for i in Counter(s).values():
    counter += i - 1

print(counter)


from collections import Counter

n = int(input())
s = input()

c = Counter(s)

ans = n - max(c.values())

print(ans)

n = int(input())
s = input()

ans = n - sum(c.values())

print(ans)

#!/usr/bin/env python3

from collections import Counter

n = int(input())
s = input()

c = Counter(s)

ans = n - sum(c.values())

print(ans)

from collections import Counter

n, s = int(input()), input()

counter = 0

for i in Counter(s).values():
    counter += i - 1

print(counter)
from collections import Counter

N = int(input())
S = input()

C = Counter(S)

ans = N - sum(C.values())

print(ans)

from collections import Counter

n = int(input())
s = input()
counter = 0
for i in Counter(s).values():
    counter += i - 1
print(counter)
